messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Seven Year Old wants to work
messages.msgSnippet: Linda, Sorry I m so far behind. ;-) If you email me off list I ll give you my number and we can talk, if you like. Did you get to the Inches meeting last week?
messages.messageBody:
Linda,
Sorry I'm so far behind. ;-) If you email me off list I'll give you my
number and we can talk, if you like. Did you get to the Inches meeting last
week?


Barb E
"The function of the child is to live his own life - not the life that his
anxious parents think he should live."
A S Neill




on 1/4/03 9:27 AM, LsMe@... at LsMe@... wrote:

> Marjorie: We're just starting to get some information on these groups - I've
> been on the INCHES e-mail list or a short time. Thanks for the info on the
> others - I'll follow up. Do you happen to know of any unschooling groups in
> this area? I keep getting leads that dead-end (wrong phone numbers, etc.).
> We're in Westerville.
>
> Thanks!
> Linda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Seven Year Old wants to work
messages.msgSnippet: As far as I know, there aren t any official unschooling groups in town, but there are a lot of unschoolers.  There also used to be a playgroup at the old
messages.messageBody:
As far as I know, there aren't any official unschooling groups in town, but
there are a lot of unschoolers. There also used to be a playgroup at the
old Resource Center for families with young children, but i don't know if it
still in existance or not. I would recommend attending a meeting or two to
see who you could hook up with.

Marjorie

Are you familiar with HECLC? It's a group trying to start a new Resource
Center in Columbus. Our next meeting is Thursday the 23rd at the
Worthington Library.

messages.subject: Re: Seven Year Old wants to work

messages.messageBody:
Marjorie: We're just starting to get some information on these groups - I've
been on the INCHES e-mail list or a short time. Thanks for the info on the
others - I'll follow up. Do you happen to know of any unschooling groups in
this area? I keep getting leads that dead-end (wrong phone numbers, etc.).
We're in Westerville.

Thanks!
Linda
